functions: Simulate Total Bases, Hits+Runs+RBIs, NBA Points, Rebounds
Calibrate traps using STC and TTM overlays
Score props for volatility, alignment, EV tier
Route qualifying props into core stack or ladder tiers

escalation_rules: Suppressed TB/Points props logged to POST-MORTEM

description: Trap simulator for MLB TB/HRR and NBA Points/Rebounds props. Applies STC and TTM overlays to route high-alignment props to core and ladder stacks.
